contact.title: Contact
contact.text: This page was created by {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family. If you have questions, please reach out to the following contacts:

support.title: Support {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family
support.text: Here are 3 ways you can make a difference and support {{firstname, capitalize}}'s family:

guestbook.title: Sign the guestbook
guestbook.text: Send your respect to the family, share your memories of {{firstname, capitalize}}, or add a picture.

donation.title: Make a donation
donation.text: The family is organizing a fundraiser in {{firstname, capitalize}}'s memory. Proceeds will go to St Jude's Children's hospital.

share.title: Share this page
share.text: Is anyone who loved {{firstname, capitalize}} missing from this page ? Send them the link so they can contribute.

message.title: Write a message
message.input-message-placeholder: Write a message for the family or share a memory of {{firstname, capitalize}}...

donation.input-show-label: Show my donation on the guestbook (the amount will be hidden)
